import React from 'react'; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import ExternalLink from './ExternalLink'; import Headshot from '../images/jonah-picture.JPG'; function About() { return(

About Me

Why I Design

Hey there! I'm Jonah. My passion is designing useful, enjoyable, and equitable digital products. I believe that as a designer, I play a critical role in shaping the future of technology.



I design because I enjoy designing. I enjoy the challenge of taking something complicated and turning it into something that is easy to understand. I enjoy coming up with new and innovative ways of presenting data. I enjoy imagining how people will interact with the products I design (I enjoy watching them interact with it even more).

My Professional Background

I have 2+ years of experience designing and developing enterprise software. Although I'm pretty new to UX, I've had a wide range of experiences. I've worked with different teams, different platforms, and different types of users.

Career Aspirations

At this point in my career, I'd consider myself a UX generalist. I have strong foundations in visual design, interaction design, UX writing, and research. Looking ahead, I'd like to specialize in either visual design or interaction design. I'm also interested in learning more about data visualization.

Thanks for reading!

); } export default About;
